useCase.name: Accessing and Applying Guides in Design Process

preconditions.precondition: Designer requests existing guides and standards.
Team Member shares a link to Guide Repository and CMS access.

successEndConditions.condition: Designer successfully applies guides in the design process.
Repository is updated with new/modified guides.
Team Member confirms adoption of guides.

useCase.trigger: Designer review and compile relevant information.

mainSequence.step: Designer requests existing guides and standards to Team Member.
Team Member shares a link to Guide Repository and CMS access with Designer.
Designer accesses the repository and reviews available guides (Style, Design, Content).
Designer applies guides in the design process and confirms with CMS.
Designer updates the repository with new/modified guides and confirms the update.
Designer shares the updated guides with Team Member.
Team Member reviews and provides feedback on the guides.
Team Member confirms the adoption of the guides.
